name: Sprott Physical Gold and Silver Trust
longDescription: Central Fund of Canada Ltd is an investment company. Its aims to invest the shareholders funds in longterm holdings of gold and silver bullion for capital appreciation. The Sprott Physical Gold and Silver Trust currently holds approximately 1.442 million ounces of gold and 60.395 million ounces of silver*. CEF provides investors with exposure to both precious metals at a time when demand is very high, and access is becoming more difficult due to disruptions in the global mining supply chain.

fullAddress: 200 Bay Street,Suite 2600, P.O. Box 26, Calgary, AB, CA
